short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Putellas blocker is an extension which will not allow you to use social media websites. You will get Putellased.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension blocks major social media websites in order for ultimate focus when doing study work.
